page.title: 14BOAT CLUB
page.content:
GP14 Sailing dinghies. There are also some large cruising yachts ranging from 17 - 40 feet in length.
Many members take part in local, national and international competitions. In the Irish Helmsman Championships last year, two of the members came 7th and 11th. The club also holds a yearly regatta to which other boat clubs are invited. This year it is being held on 22nd June to coincide with the raft-race which is taking place at the Loughshore Park.
The present commodore of the club is Mr Burnett.
